title: Since I Was Reincarnated As A Villainous Daughter As A Mob, I Decided To Disguise Myself As A Man And Be Captured By The Heroine - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Gender Bender   Romance   School Life   Slice of Life
tags: Cross-dressing   European Ambience   Mob Protagonist   Nobles   Otome Game   Reincarnated in Another World   Reincarnation   Shoujo-Ai Subplot   Villainess Noble Girls
author: Okazaki Masamune   岡崎マサムネ
description:
One day, Elizabeth Barton, a villainous daughter who is a mob, suddenly regains her memory of her previous life and realizes that she has reincarnated in the world of the otome game ‘Royal Lovers’.

Elizabeth is dissatisfied with the world of this otome game, where only good-looking guys are given preferential treatment.

“That’s right. I should be the target of the capture.”

Thus, the days of aiming for the noble and fabulous capture target of the Duke’s daughter Elizabeth, who will fall in love with the main character, the ‘heroine’, have begun.

A heart-full romantic comedy that the protagonist dresses up as a man, polishes himself, is told by girls, and sometimes for some reason he pushes forward while deepening his ties with other targets.>
